name: Table Tennis AR
description:
Table Tennis AR is an Augmented Reality Table Tennis game with Multiplayer support.

Features:

Realistic graphics, gameplay and physics. Excellently polished tables and rackets.

Multiplayer support, play with your friends!

Sophisticated AI. Play Single Player against an AI with 4 different difficulty levels to choose from.

Choose from 3 different types of tables such as clay, grass and basic with each offering unique game play experience.

Cool new Spectator mode! Watch your friends play a Table Tennis AR match in the real world and see who wins.

.
Please email us at support@maxmatch.co for feedback and suggestions and rate us, we would be delighted!



Important:
- Augmented Reality experience requires Camera Usage permission.
- Compatibility information may be changed at any time.
- Not compatible with devices which does not support Apple's ARKit.
- Table Tennis AR supports unreliable networking scenarios hence cannot guarantee 60 fps smooth synchronisation all the time in Multiplayer scenario.
- Information current as of July, 2019.

Credits: Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com
